enemies.name: chaser
enemies.description: An enemy ship that simply tries to crash into your ship. Its weapons are pathetic but its well built.

enemy.name: fail
enemy.description: A failed experiement to create an ultimate bullet of mass destruction has created this fast, but nevertheless pathetic piece of garbage.

player.name: basic
player.description: A very basic blue bullet. Upgrade for multiple bullets at once.

player.name: bomb
player.description: This tiny bullet is slow, but packs quite a punch. Explodes on contact.

misc.name: asteroid
misc.description: A random floating asteroid. Your ship (and enemy ones!) are moving too fast to stop in time. Avoid at all costs!
